          <title>
            <string language="fr">Un diagramme de périscope</string>
            <string language="en">A periscope diagram</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Periscopediagramm</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um diagrama do periscope</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Uno schema del periscope</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα διάγραμμα περισκοπίων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un diagrama del periscopio</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Ce diagramme montre l'agencement des miroirs dans  un périscope qui peut voir des choses par derrière.</string>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows the arrangement of mirrors in a periscope that can see things from behind.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>

            <string language="en">angle of incidence</string>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt die Anordnung für Spiegel 
in einem Periscope, der Sachen von hinten sehen kann.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra o arranjo dos espelhos em um 
periscope que possa ver coisas de atrás.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema mostra la disposizione degli specchi
in un periscope che può vedere le cose da dietro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα εμφανίζει τη ρύθμιση των καθρεφτών 
σε ένα περισκόπιο που μπορεί να δει τα πράγματα από 
πίσω.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra el arreglo de espejos en un
periscopio que pueda ver cosas de detrás.</string>
          </description>
